hero.line1: We find the clients your business is looking for.

stats.stat4_desc: more than half end in a sale

method.title: How we work to help you sell more
method.step1_text: We sit down with you. Who is your ideal client? How do you sell today? What have you tried? We design the plan: ads, web, lead sourcing, emails, calls. Only what you truly need. Nothing more, nothing less.
method.step2_text: We move fast. We build campaigns, websites, automations. We launch in days, not months. We personalize messaging for your ideal client. And when it works, we scale. We have years of experience, we master the tools, we know what works.
method.step3_text: This is the difference: we are not your typical marketing agency. We live for your sales. We generate contacts. We call. We engage. We qualify. We help you with the sales script, the call, the close. We have real sales experience. Only people ready to buy reach you.
method.step4_text: Contacts, meetings, closed deals, ROI. We adjust constantly. We are flexible. We master many tools. That is why we are competitive and fast. If something doesn't work, we pivot. If it works, we accelerate.
method.cta_desc: We'll tell you exactly what we would do in your case. Free. No strings attached.

services.title: What do you need?
services.subtitle: Not all businesses are the same. Find the solution that fits you best.
services.service1_desc: We build optimized lists of your ideal clients. We design campaigns with personalized emails. We call, qualify, and schedule meetings. We help you close with sharper sales arguments.
services.service2_desc: We generate traffic from people who can actually buy from you. We optimize your website to convert more visitors. We help you improve your offer and close the sale.
services.service3_tag: YOU WANT TO SELL YOUR SERVICES ONLINE
services.service3_desc: We help you bring your professional services online (non-ecommerce). We define the right technology for your case. We set up the full system and support you so you start selling online.
services.service4_tag: YOU NEED TO OPTIMIZE YOUR BUSINESS PROCESSES
services.service4_desc: We bring order to your business. We optimize sales and marketing processes with artificial intelligence. We build automations that save time and money. We train your team.
services.service5_tag: I WANT TO LEARN AND DO IT MYSELF
services.service5_desc: We set everything up for you: tools, lead generation campaigns, databases, templates. We train your marketing or sales team. Then you run it all with full autonomy.

about.title: Marketing and Sales, one team
about.text: Marcos (Digital Strategy) and Jorge (Business Development). In 2022, we joined our professional paths and validated a truth: when digital marketing and sales work together, results skyrocket. No friction, no siloed departments, just growth. That is why at Magnetia, technology is not a barrier, it is an accelerator. We implement the most advanced tools on the market, but simplified to be accessible and useful from day one. Our obsession is to remove all the technical noise so you can focus solely on growing your business.

finalCta.title: Ready to generate qualified clients?
finalCta.text: Book 15 minutes. We analyze your business, identify opportunities, and show you how to get meetings with real decision-makers.
finalCta.sub: Free · No strings attached · 15-min video call

contact.title: Let's talk about your business
contact.desc: Book a Free Strategy Session with us. On this call, we will talk about your business, learn about your goals and current challenges. Together, we will identify the best digital marketing opportunities for your business and outline a custom sales funnel.
contact.calendar_hint: Choose the day and time that works best for you.
contact.step: Take the first step toward better results, stronger sales, and more clients. We want to help you take your business to the next level.
contact.direct_text: Maybe you prefer a more direct approach, have specific questions, or simply want to have a conversation about anything. No problem! We are here for you. Reach out through any of the following channels:

footer.copyright: © Magnetia 2026 · From Cangas del Narcea to the world

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: At Magnetia, S.L.L., we take the protection of your personal data very seriously. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and current Spanish legislation.
privacyPolicy.section1_item3: Address: Calle Pelayo 8, 1ºB, 33800 Cangas del Narcea, Asturias, Spain
privacyPolicy.section2_intro: We may collect and process the following categories of personal data:
privacyPolicy.section2_item1: Identification data: Name, surname, email address, telephone number
privacyPolicy.section2_item2: Company data: Company name, position, industry sector
privacyPolicy.section2_item3: Navigation data: IP address, browser type, pages visited, time spent (through cookies)
privacyPolicy.section2_item4: Commercial data: Information about inquiries, service contracting, and communications
privacyPolicy.section3_intro: Your personal data will be processed for the following purposes:
privacyPolicy.section3_item1: Managing information requests and inquiries received through the website
privacyPolicy.section3_item2: Providing contracted services and maintaining the commercial relationship
privacyPolicy.section3_item3: Performing analysis and improvements of our services
privacyPolicy.section3_item4: Sending commercial communications about our services (only with your prior consent)
privacyPolicy.section3_item5: Complying with legal and tax obligations
privacyPolicy.section4_intro: The processing of your data is based on:
privacyPolicy.section4_item1: Consent: By providing us with your data through contact or subscription forms
privacyPolicy.section4_item2: Contract execution: When necessary for the provision of requested services
privacyPolicy.section4_item3: Legitimate interest: For website usage analysis and service improvement
privacyPolicy.section4_item4: Legal obligation: When required by current regulations
privacyPolicy.section5_p1: The personal data provided will be retained for the time necessary to fulfill the purpose for which it was collected and to determine any liabilities that may arise from such purpose and data processing. As a general rule, data will be retained for a period of 5 years from the last interaction, unless:
privacyPolicy.section5_item1: There is a legal obligation to retain it for a longer period
privacyPolicy.section5_item2: The data subject requests its deletion before that period
privacyPolicy.section5_item3: It is necessary to fulfill current contractual obligations
privacyPolicy.section6_intro: Your data may be communicated to:
privacyPolicy.section6_item1: Technology service providers (hosting, email marketing, web analytics)
privacyPolicy.section6_item3: Public administrations when there is a legal obligation
privacyPolicy.section6_p1: No international data transfers will be made outside the European Economic Area without adequate protection guarantees.
privacyPolicy.section7_intro: In accordance with the GDPR, you have the right to:
privacyPolicy.section7_item1: Access: Know what personal data we are processing about you
privacyPolicy.section7_item2: Rectification: Request the correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
privacyPolicy.section7_item3: Erasure: Request the deletion of your data when it is no longer necessary
privacyPolicy.section7_item4: Restriction: Request the restriction of processing of your data
privacyPolicy.section7_item5: Portability: Receive your data in a structured, commonly used format
privacyPolicy.section7_item6: Objection: Object to the processing of your data in certain circumstances
privacyPolicy.section7_item7: Consent withdrawal: Withdraw consent at any time
privacyPolicy.section8_intro: To exercise any of these rights, you can contact us at:
privacyPolicy.section8_item2: Postal address: Calle Pelayo 8, 1ºB, 33800 Cangas del Narcea, Asturias, Spain
privacyPolicy.section8_p1: You must include a photocopy of your ID card or equivalent document proving your identity. We will respond to your request within a maximum period of one month from receipt.
privacyPolicy.section8_p2: You also have the right to file a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency (
privacyPolicy.section8_p2_end: ) if you consider that the processing of your data does not comply with current regulations.
privacyPolicy.section9_p1: Magnetia, S.L.L. has adopted the necessary technical and organizational measures to ensure the security and integrity of the personal data it processes, as well as to prevent its loss, alteration, and/or access by unauthorized third parties.
privacyPolicy.section10_p1: This website is not intended for children under 14 years of age. If you are a minor, you will need the consent of your parents or guardians to provide us with your personal data. If we detect that we have collected data from a minor without adequate parental consent, we will delete such information as soon as possible.
privacyPolicy.section11_p1: This website uses cookies to improve user experience and analyze site traffic. For more information about cookie usage, please consult our
privacyPolicy.section12_p1: Magnetia, S.L.L. reserves the right to modify this Privacy Policy to adapt it to legislative and jurisprudential developments or changes in our business practices. Any modification will be published on this website with an indication of the last update date.
privacyPolicy.section13_intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or about the processing of your personal data, please do not hesitate to contact us:
privacyPolicy.section13_item3: Address: Calle Pelayo 8, 1ºB, 33800 Cangas del Narcea, Asturias, Spain

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.section1_p1: A cookie is a small file that is stored on the user's computer and allows us to recognize them. Cookies help us improve the quality of our website, allowing us to monitor which pages are useful, which are not, and which are susceptible to improvement.
cookiePolicy.section1_p2: Cookies are essential for the operation of the Internet, providing countless advantages in the provision of interactive services, facilitating your navigation and usability of our website.
cookiePolicy.section1_p3: The information we provide below will help you understand the different types of cookies:
cookiePolicy.section2_subtitle1: According to the entity that manages them
cookiePolicy.section2_s1_item1: First-party cookies: These are those sent to the user's terminal equipment from a computer or domain managed by the editor itself and from which the service requested by the user is provided.
cookiePolicy.section2_s1_item2: Third-party cookies: These are those sent to the user's terminal equipment from a computer or domain that is not managed by the editor, but by another entity that processes the data obtained through cookies.
cookiePolicy.section2_s2_item1: Session cookies: These are a type of cookies designed to collect and store data while the user accesses a web page. They are usually used to store information that is only of interest to preserve for the provision of the service requested by the user on a single occasion.
cookiePolicy.section2_s2_item2: Persistent cookies: These are a type of cookies in which the data remains stored on the terminal and can be accessed and processed for a period defined by the cookie controller, which can range from a few minutes to several years.
cookiePolicy.section2_s3_item1: Technical cookies: These allow the user to navigate through the restricted area and use its different functions, such as carrying out the purchase process of an item.
cookiePolicy.section2_s3_item2: Personalization cookies: These allow the user to access the service with some general characteristics predefined according to a series of criteria on the user's terminal, such as the language or the type of browser through which they connect to the service.
cookiePolicy.section2_s3_item3: Analytics cookies: These allow the controller to monitor and analyze the behavior of users of the websites to which they are linked. The information collected through this type of cookies is used to measure the activity of websites, applications or platforms and to create navigation profiles of users of these sites, in order to introduce improvements in the service based on user usage data.
cookiePolicy.section2_s3_item4: Advertising cookies: These allow the most effective management possible of advertising spaces that the editor has included on a web page, application or platform from which the requested service is provided based on criteria such as edited content or the frequency with which ads are displayed.
cookiePolicy.section3_intro: This website uses the following cookies:
cookiePolicy.section3_google_analytics_p1: This website uses Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google, Inc., a Delaware company whose main office is at 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View (California), CA 94043, United States.
cookiePolicy.section3_google_analytics_p2: Google Analytics uses cookies to help the website analyze how users use the website. The information generated by the cookie about your use of the website (including your IP address) will be directly transmitted and stored by Google on its servers in the United States.
cookiePolicy.section3_google_analytics_p3: Google will use this information on our behalf for the purpose of tracking your use of the website, compiling reports on website activity and providing other services related to website activity and Internet usage.
cookiePolicy.section3_google_adsense_p1: Google, as an associated provider, uses cookies to publish ads on our website. Google uses cookies to display ads based on users' previous visits to our website or other sites.
cookiePolicy.section3_doubleclick_p1: DoubleClick is a Google advertising platform that uses cookies to improve the effectiveness of online advertising.
cookiePolicy.section4_p1: You can allow, block or delete cookies installed on your device by configuring the options of the browser installed on your computer.
cookiePolicy.section4_p2: Most web browsers offer the possibility of allowing, blocking or deleting cookies installed on your device.
cookiePolicy.section4_p3: Below you can access the configuration of the most common web browsers to accept, install or disable cookies:
cookiePolicy.section4_chrome_step1: Click on the menu (three vertical dots icon) in the upper right corner
cookiePolicy.section4_chrome_step3: Click on "Privacy and security" in the left panel
cookiePolicy.section4_chrome_step5: Here you can configure your cookie preferences
cookiePolicy.section4_firefox_step1: Click on the menu (three horizontal lines icon) in the upper right corner
cookiePolicy.section4_firefox_step3: Click on "Privacy and security" in the left panel
cookiePolicy.section4_firefox_step4: In the "Cookies and site data" section you can manage cookies
cookiePolicy.section4_safari_step1: Open Safari and click on "Safari" in the menu bar
cookiePolicy.section4_safari_step4: In "Cookies and website data" you can manage cookies
cookiePolicy.section4_edge_step1: Click on the menu (three dots icon) in the upper right corner
cookiePolicy.section4_opera_step1: Click on the menu in the upper left corner
cookiePolicy.section4_opera_step3: Click on "Privacy and security" in the left panel
cookiePolicy.section4_opera_step4: In "Cookies and other site data" you can manage cookies
cookiePolicy.section5_p1: If you want to specifically reject Google Analytics cookies in all browsers, you can install the Google Analytics browser opt-out add-on:
cookiePolicy.section6_p1: If you decide to disable all cookies, the quality and speed of the service may decrease and you may even lose the ability to access some of the services offered on the website.
cookiePolicy.section7_p1: Magnetia, S.L.L. may modify this Cookie Policy based on legislative or regulatory requirements, or in order to adapt this policy to instructions issued by the Spanish Data Protection Agency.
cookiePolicy.section7_p2: When significant changes occur in this Cookie Policy, users will be notified through the website.
cookiePolicy.section8_intro: For any questions about this Cookie Policy, you can contact us at:
cookiePolicy.section8_item3: Address: Calle Pelayo 8, 1ºB, 33800 Cangas del Narcea, Asturias, Spain
